required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety Surveillance After Immunization With IXIARO
clinical_study.official_title: Active Surveillance for Adverse Events After Immunization With IXIARO(R) Among U.S. Military Service Personnel

brief_summary.textblock:
This is an active electronic surveillance using data from the Defense Medical Surveillance System (DMSS) to detect and characterize serious, rare adverse events occurring within 42 days after vaccination with the Japanese Encephalitis Vaccine IXIARO within the US Military, to detect adverse events that occur more frequently after IXIARO and to electronically follow up pregnancies during or shortly before which IXIARO was administered.
There will be no intervention and no individuals contacted.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of pre-defined, serious adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: 42 days after each dose of IXIARO

secondary_outcome.measure: Detection of non-predefined Adverse Events overrepresented after IXIARO
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 42 days after each dose of IXIARO
secondary_outcome.description: Data-mining for overrepresented Adverse events in the IXIARO exposed group compared to comparison group
Detect and describe pregnancy complications following inadvertent vaccination in pregnant women
Detect and describe infant health complications following inadvertent vaccination in pregnant women

arm_group.description: Male and female active duty U.S. military personnel ≥ 17 years of age who either received at least one dose of IXIARO
Male and female active duty U.S. military personnel ≥ 17 years of age who either received at least one dose of JE-VAX

intervention.intervention_name: Japanese Encephalitis Virus vaccine, inactivated, adsorbed
intervention.description: 2 x 6mcg / 0.5mL intramuscular injection, Day 0 and 28 (Primary series) or 1x 6mcg / 0.5mL intramuscular injection (Booster)

study_pop.textblock: Active duty military personnel (Army, Navy, Air Force, and Marines) who are ≥17 years of age and received at least one dose of Japanese encephalitis vaccine.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Male and female active duty U.S. military personnel ≥ 17 years of age who either received at least one dose of IXIARO (IXIARO exposed group) or at least one dose of JE-VAX (comparison group).
Exclusion Criteria:
- Individuals who have an ICD-9-CM code suggestive of one of the predefined adverse events screened for in IC51-401 prior to vaccination with IXIARO cannot with certainty be classified as being "disease free" at study entry and will be excluded for that adverse event.
